title: Villain Voice Pack Of 117 Efforts and Phrases
description: 117 Efforts and Phrases For Any Game, HQ Mono .wav files in 44.1khz Studio Quality, unique phrases and efforts of a deep voice viking or warrior for FPS, MOBA, RPG, Action-Adventure, Survival, Horror, Shooter, RTS, Sandbox games, Mobile Games!
longDescription:
LISTEN TO PACK HERE | LIST OF PHRASES


This pack includes 117 High Quality Villain Protagonist or Antagonist Type Bad Guy Efforts and Phrases, recorded on Studio Equipment by a professional Voice Actor and covers everything you need for your next project.


The voice suites any deep voice character you might need such as:

  • Villain Character
  • Evil Character
  • Rough Character
  • Anti Hero
  • Warlock Character
  • Magician Character
  • Shaman Character
  • Any Mid Range NPC character.


This pack is great for genres such as:

  • FPS
  • MOBA
  • RPG
  • Action Adventure
  • Survival
  • Horror
  • Shooter
  • RTS
  • Sandbox games
  • Side Scrollers
  • Retro Games
  • Animation
  • Videos
  • And the list goes on!


All efforts and phrases included in this pack are unique and completely royalty-free that have been mixed and mastered to studio level quality.


MAIN FEATURES:

  • 117 HQ Mono .wav files of good selection of common efforts and phrases for any game
  • Professional Male Voice Actor
  • This pack is divided into the effort/phrases type to locate the files easily
  • Top of the line studio quality voice recordings, each line carefully edited and mastered to sit perfectly in your mix.
  • All files are in high-quality .WAV (24 Bit 44.1 kHz Mono) format, organized and ready to use!
  • Perfect for video games, animations, trailers, YouTube videos, and all other audio / visual productions.


TECHNICAL DETAILS:

  • Number of Audio tracks: 117
  • Number of Audio Cues: 117
  • Sample rate: 44.1khz 24bit 1058 kbps MONO
  • Does audio loop: YES
  • Minutes of audio provided: 3:28 min
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Supported Target Build Platforms: All


Music in preview is NOT included in this pack. It’s used for watermark purposes only.

Website for more voices or phrases: https://www.christopherromance.com/
